rule: The output must omit the background details of the photo.
input: An astronaut floating in the vastness of space, surrounded by the stars. The image should invoke thoughtfulness and the infinity of the universe.
output: A lone astronaut drifting in a stark white suit against an infinite backdrop of twinkling stars, soft twilight lighting highlighting the micro gravity environment to evoke a sense of wonder and contemplation amidst cosmic vastness.
complianceText:
The output describes the subject (a lone astronaut in a stark white suit) and their characteristics. It mentions the timing and lighting (soft twilight lighting) and describes the background (an infinite backdrop of twinkling stars). It concludes with the feeling the image should evoke (wonder and contemplation amidst cosmic vastness). It is crafted in a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words.

OK
